mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO scraped_products (job_id, category_id, rank, product_name, price, image_url, product_url, source_site, extra_data, scraped_at) VALUES
(#{p.jobId}, #{p.categoryId}, #{p.rank}, #{p.productName}, #{p.price}, #{p.imageUrl}, #{p.productUrl}, #{p.sourceSite}, #{p.extraData}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT sp.id, sp.job_id, sp.category_id, sp.rank, sp.product_name, sp.price, sp.image_url, sp.product_url, sp.source_site, sp.extra_data, sp.scraped_at FROM scraped_products sp WHERE sp.job_id = #{jobId} ORDER BY sp.category_id, sp.rank
